item.title: Covers and first pages of Lloyd's Kora Hottentot Book I & III-1 or MP4
item.comments: y 1879 to Nov. 17th 1879.", 2) Note in pencil on facing page: "Taken by I. Lloyd & corrected by Lucy Lloyd. Pp 1-5; Informant: Griet and 54-72: Piet pp 27 rev-34 rev: Piet", 3) There is a short list of untranslated words on the first page (unnumbered) by Isabella Lloyd under the heading '(Bushman)'
